name: Blister Beetle
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Blister Spray (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The beetle exhales a 15-foot cone of caustic acid, causing painful blisters to form on the skin of any creature caught in the spray. Creatures in the area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
